name: Specifying ground source heat pumps
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: From initial georeporting and design through to installation, this session delivers some best practice pointers for specifying and installing ground source heat pumps.  It also includes some case study material of successful GSHP projects at different scales.

presentations.name: Georeporting and specification
presentations.speakers: John Findlay, Consultant in Renewable Energy and Water Management, Carbon Zero Consulting

presentations.name: Social housing case study – Yeovil: installing 200 GSHP in 90 days
presentations.speakers: John Barker-Brown, Special Project Manager, Kensa
